```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
npi_tib <- here::here("data-raw/dev_docs/data_dev/npi_osf_with_colnames.dat") %>% 
  readr::read_tsv() %>% 
  dplyr::na_if(., 99) 

## remove variables with complete missing data on npi & remove cases with complete missing data on npi

npi_tib <-  npi_tib %>%
  dplyr::select(-c(npi05, npi11, npi18, npi21, npi23, npi27, npi34, npi36)) %>% 
  dplyr::filter_at(
    vars(starts_with("npi")),
    any_vars(!is.na(.))
    )
 
npi_tib %>% 
  mice::md.pattern(., rotate.names = TRUE)
```
